nodes.text: The Bulton Cruises was a Ferryboat liner that was present at Camen Spaceport when the Hurrim Lambda-class T-4a shuttle Merte, stolen by two members of Dunari's coalition, escaped the Hurrim's asteroid base under heavy pursuit of Preybird-class starfighters. Alliance High Command sent a strike force of two A-wings to cover the retreat until the shuttle reached hyperspace. Her cargo contained tourists.
